availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Big Clifty, Grayson County, KY. A farmer. Born in Leitchfield, Grayson County, KY, son of Stanton Snyder and Monica J. Dennis. Married Kiziah Riggs, Grayson County, KY, 14 Nov 1854.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, Big Clifty post office, p. 162.

Find A Grave, Entry for William Jasper Snyder (1836-1911), Find A Grave Memorial # 16421259, Arthur-Melugin Cemetery, Avilla, Jasper County, Missouri, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=snyder&GSfn=william&GSbyrel=all&GSdy=1911&GSdyrel=in&GSst=26&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=16421259&df=all& (accessed 25 June 2017).
